comments:
build I20040330

While doing an unrelated operation (Ctrl+O, which is also broken in this build),
I got the following error (dialog + log entry).

It seems like the sync state calculation should either skip resources that are
out of sync, or force a refresh on them.  

Plus, in this case, it's unclear what the user should do about it since
CVS/Entries files are hidden.


!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.core 4 4 Apr 05, 2004 09:52:22.843
!MESSAGE Errors have occured while calculating the synchronization state for CVS
Workspace.
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 274 Apr 05, 2004 09:52:22.843
!MESSAGE Resource is out of sync with the file system: /org.eclipse.swt/Eclipse
SWT/common/org/eclipse/swt/CVS/Entries.
!STACK 1
org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceException: Resource is out of sync
with the file system: /org.eclipse.swt/Eclipse
SWT/common/org/eclipse/swt/CVS/Entries.
	at
org.eclipse.core.internal.localstore.FileSystemResourceManager.read(FileSystemResourceManager.java:484)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.File.getContents(File.java:256)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.File.getContents(File.java:246)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.util.SyncFileWriter.readLines(SyncFileWriter.java:455)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.util.SyncFileWriter.readAllResourceSync(SyncFileWriter.java:98)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseSynchronizer.cacheResourceSyncForChildren(EclipseSynchronizer.java:807)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseSynchronizer.getSyncBytes(EclipseSynchronizer.java:292)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseResource.getSyncBytes(EclipseResource.java:196)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseResource.isManaged(EclipseResource.java:155)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseResource.isIgnored(EclipseResource.java:109)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSSyncTreeSubscriber.isSupervised(CVSSyncTreeSubscriber.java:95)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSSyncTreeSubscriber.getSyncInfo(CVSSyncTreeSubscriber.java:75)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.subscribers.SubscriberEventHandler.collect(SubscriberEventHandler.java:234)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.subscribers.SubscriberEventHandler.processEvent(SubscriberEventHandler.java:385)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.BackgroundEventHandler.processEvents(BackgroundEventHandler.java:273)
	at
org.eclipse.team.internal.core.BackgroundEventHandler$1.run(BackgroundEventHandler.java:131)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:62)
!SUBENTRY 2 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 274 Apr 05, 2004 09:52:22.843
!MESSAGE Resource is out of sync with the file system: /org.eclipse.swt/Eclipse
SWT/common/org/eclipse/swt/CVS/Entries.
We should just read the meta files even if they are out-of sync.
*** Bug 57565 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Fix released to HEAD. We now do a forced read.

traces.message: Resource is out of sync with the file system: /org.eclipse.swt/Eclipse SWT/common/org/eclipse/swt/CVS/Entries.
